meanings.definition: Situated or occurring within the body; inner.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined my internal organs.
meanings.sent2: It is important to take care of your internal health.
meanings.sent3: My internal alarm clock always wakes me up before my alarm.
meanings.sent4: Her internal compass always guides her in the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The internal workings of a computer can be complex.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring within an organization or institution.
meanings.sent1: The internal policies of the company must be followed.
meanings.sent2: Teamwork is crucial for internal harmony within a group.
meanings.sent3: The internal office gossip can sometimes be entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The internal dynamics of the team determine its success.
meanings.sent5: Internal communication is key to a well-functioning organization.

meanings.sent1: She kept her internal struggles hidden from others.
meanings.sent2: Understanding your own internal motivations is important.
meanings.sent3: His internal monologue was filled with self-doubt.
meanings.sent4: The artist's paintings reflected her internal emotions.
meanings.sent5: Exploring your internal world can lead to self-discovery.
